Columns.Name: 特別改良判定保証単価フラグ
グループ標準調査単価
グループ標準保証単価
グループ標準基礎単価

ExternalDatabaseInfo.CreateViewSql:
SELECT 
    `main`.`顧客ID` AS `顧客ID`,
    `main`.`グループID` AS `グループID`,
    `main`.`申込タイプID` AS `申込タイプID`,
    `main`.`商品ID` AS `商品ID`,
    `main`.`申込区分` AS `申込区分`,
    (CASE 
        WHEN `subc`.`original_product_name` IS NOT NULL 
        THEN `subc`.`original_product_name` 
        ELSE `main`.`商品名` 
     END) AS `商品名`,
    (CASE 
        WHEN `subc`.`original_billing_product_name` IS NOT NULL 
        THEN `subc`.`original_billing_product_name` 
        ELSE `main`.`請求品名` 
     END) AS `請求品名`,
    (CASE 
        WHEN `subc`.`original_special_note` IS NOT NULL 
        THEN `subc`.`original_special_note` 
        ELSE `main`.`商品注釈` 
     END) AS `商品注釈`,
    (CASE 
        WHEN `subc`.`special_price` IS NOT NULL 
        THEN `subc`.`special_price` 
        ELSE `main`.`販売単価` 
     END) AS `販売単価`,
    (CASE 
        WHEN `subc`.`special_price` IS NOT NULL 
        THEN 1 
        ELSE 0 
     END) AS `特別販売単価フラグ`,
    (CASE 
        WHEN `subc`.`special_survey_price` IS NOT NULL 
        THEN `subc`.`special_survey_price` 
        ELSE `main`.`調査単価` 
     END) AS `調査単価`,
    (CASE 
        WHEN `subc`.`special_survey_price` IS NOT NULL 
        THEN 1 
        ELSE 0 
     END) AS `特別調査単価フラグ`,
    (CASE 
        WHEN `subc`.`special_analysis_price` IS NOT NULL 
        THEN `subc`.`special_analysis_price` 
        ELSE `main`.`解析単価` 
     END) AS `解析単価`,
    (CASE 
        WHEN `subc`.`special_analysis_price` IS NOT NULL 
        THEN 1 
        ELSE 0 
     END) AS `特別解析単価フラグ`,
    (CASE 
        WHEN `subc`.`special_gurantee_price` IS NOT NULL 
        THEN `subc`.`special_gurantee_price` 
        ELSE `main`.`保証単価` 
     END) AS `保証単価`,
    (CASE 
        WHEN `subc`.`special_gurantee_price` IS NOT NULL 
        THEN 1 
        ELSE 0 
     END) AS `特別保証単価フラグ`,
    (CASE 
        WHEN `subc`.`special_impjudge_gurantee_price` IS NOT NULL 
        THEN `subc`.`special_impjudge_gurantee_price` 
        ELSE `main`.`改良判定保証単価` 
     END) AS `改良判定保証単価`,
    (CASE 
        WHEN `subc`.`special_impjudge_gurantee_price` IS NOT NULL 
        THEN 1 
        ELSE 0 
     END) AS `特別改良判定保証単価フラグ`,
    (CASE 
        WHEN `subc`.`special_base_price` IS NOT NULL 
        THEN `subc`.`special_base_price` 
        ELSE `main`.`基礎単価` 
     END) AS `基礎単価`,
    (CASE 
        WHEN `subc`.`special_base_price` IS NOT NULL 
        THEN 1 
        ELSE 0 
     END) AS `特別基礎単価フラグ`,
    `main`.`販売単価` AS `グループ標準単価`,
    `main`.`調査単価` AS `グループ標準調査単価`,
    `main`.`保証単価` AS `グループ標準保証単価`,
    `main`.`基礎単価` AS `グループ標準基礎単価`,
    `main`.`並び順` AS `並び順`,
    (CASE 
        WHEN `subd`.`product_public_flg` IS NOT NULL
        THEN `subd`.`product_public_flg`
        ELSE `main`.`商品公開フラグ`
     END) AS `商品公開フラグ`,
    (CASE 
        WHEN `main`.`有効フラグ` = 0 THEN 0
        WHEN `subc`.`active_flg` = 0 THEN 0
        ELSE 1
     END) AS `有効フラグ`
FROM 
    (
        SELECT 
            `main`.`customer_id` AS `顧客ID`,
            `sub`.`グループID` AS `グループID`,
            `sub`.`申込タイプID` AS `申込タイプID`,
            `sub`.`申込区分` AS `申込区分`,  
            `sub`.`商品ID` AS `商品ID`,
            `sub`.`商品名` AS `商品名`,
            `sub`.`請求品名` AS `請求品名`,
            `sub`.`商品注釈` AS `商品注釈`,
            `sub`.`販売単価` AS `販売単価`,
            `sub`.`特別販売単価フラグ` AS `特別販売単価フラグ`,
            `sub`.`調査単価` AS `調査単価`,
            `sub`.`特別調査単価フラグ` AS `特別調査単価フラグ`,
            `sub`.`解析単価` AS `解析単価`,
            `sub`.`特別解析単価フラグ` AS `特別解析単価フラグ`,
            `sub`.`保証単価` AS `保証単価`,
            `sub`.`特別保証単価フラグ` AS `特別保証単価フラグ`,
            `sub`.`改良判定保証単価` AS `改良判定保証単価`,
            `sub`.`特別改良判定保証単価フラグ` AS `特別改良判定保証単価フラグ`,
            `sub`.`基礎単価` AS `基礎単価`,
            `sub`.`特別基礎単価フラグ` AS `特別基礎単価フラグ`,
            `sub`.`標準単価` AS `標準単価`,
            `sub`.`標準調査単価` AS `標準調査単価`,
            `sub`.`標準保証単価` AS `標準保証単価`,
            `sub`.`標準基礎単価` AS `標準基礎単価`,
            `sub`.`商品公開フラグ` AS `商品公開フラグ`,
            `sub`.`並び順` AS `並び順`,
            `sub`.`有効フラグ` AS `有効フラグ`
        FROM 
            `m_customer_group` `main`
        JOIN 
            `v_group_product` `sub` 
            ON `main`.`group_id` = `sub`.`グループID`
        ORDER BY 
            `main`.`customer_id`
    ) `main`
LEFT JOIN 
    `m_customer_product` `subc` 
    ON (
        `main`.`顧客ID` = `subc`.`customer_id`
        AND `main`.`グループID` = `subc`.`group_id`
        AND `main`.`申込タイプID` = `subc`.`ordertype_id`
        AND `main`.`商品ID` = `subc`.`product_id`
    )
LEFT JOIN 
    `m_customer_product_public` `subd` 
    ON (
        `main`.`顧客ID` = `subd`.`customer_id`
        AND `main`.`グループID` = `subd`.`group_id`
        AND `main`.`申込タイプID` = `subd`.`order_type_id`
        AND `main`.`商品ID` = `subd`.`product_id`
    )
